ErrorMessageComponent.REFRESH_FAIL_GENERIC: We are unable to refresh your radio online. Please call 1 866-635-0565 for help.
ErrorMessageComponent.REFRESH_FAIL_MAXIMUM_LIMIT: Oops. The number of activation signals allowed within a 24 hour period has been exceeded.
